sentences.en: Arbitrary arrests and detention without trial were common.
sentences.cn: 随意逮捕和拘留屡见不鲜。

sentences.en: He has clearly not been chastened by his thirteen days in detention.
sentences.cn: 显然，13天拘留并没能让他悔过自新。

sentences.en: He said that he was not tortured or maltreated during his detention.
sentences.cn: 他说自己在押期间并未遭受拷问和虐待。

sentences.en: He was held in detention from 1991 to 2009.
sentences.cn: 他从1991年到2009年一直被监禁.

Investigating detention is constitutional only if probable cause exists.

sentences.en: Jails and temporary detention camps are overflowing.
sentences.cn: 监狱和临时拘留所里人满为患。

sentences.en: Such an offence shall be punished by detention in prison or at hard labour.
sentences.cn: 这样的罪行将处以监禁或服苦役.

sentences.cn: 滞留全班学生是不公平的.

sentences.en: The detention raised two distinct but closely linked questions.
sentences.cn: 这一拘留行为引发了两个互为独立但又密切相关的问题。

sentences.en: The teacher kept the boys in detention after school.
sentences.cn: 老师将这些男生课后留堂。

sentences.en: They have been held in detention since the end of June.
sentences.cn: 他们从6月底以来就一直受到监禁。

sentences.cn: 他们被关在拘留营里直至战争结束.
